story.hline: The contrasting worlds of Rohit and Rahul
story.intro: Where the LSG skipper and his side are enjoying a fine run of form, Rohit and the Mumbai Indians continue to search for a chasm of light amid the gloom
story.seoHeadline: The contrasting worlds of Rohit and Rahul

coverImage.caption: Mumbai Indians are winless in eight games this season.

story.hline: KL Rahul's love affair with MI continues
story.intro: The Lucknow Super Giants skipper scored more than 60% of his team's total as MI lost their eighth straight game
story.seoHeadline: KL Rahul's love affair with MI continues

coverImage.caption: Rahul has scored hundreds in both games now against Mumbai Indians this season.

story.hline: Can Rahul and LSG begin their new journey with a bang?
story.intro: The IPL debutants are a team stacked with all-rounders, backed up by quality batting line-up and plenty of fire in the bowling
story.seoHeadline: Can Rahul and LSG begin their new journey with a bang?

coverImage.caption: Apart from Rahul, the Super Giants picked Marcus Stoinis and Ravi Bishnoi as their other two pre-auction buys.

story.hline: KL Rahul signed by Lucknow franchise for INR 17 crores

coverImage.caption: KL Rahul and Ravi Bishnoi, teammates at Punjab Kings, will be part of the Lucknow franchise.

story.hline: Pant-Rahul century stand, Thakur's 40* help India to 287
story.intro: Pant and Rahul struck half-centuries but it required a cameo from Thakur to help India post a challenging total

story.hline: Rahul named captain for South Africa ODIs; Ashwin returns

coverImage.caption: Rahul was earlier named Test vice-captain in Rohit's absence.

story.hline: Enjoying leaving balls outside off stump: Rahul
story.intro: The Indian opener batted in excess of six hours across two days to lay the foundation stone for India's win at Centurion
story.seoHeadline: Enjoying leaving balls outside off stump: KL Rahul, India cricket tour of South Africa, 2021-22

coverImage.caption: The seeds of India's 1-0 lead and a big step towards a historic series victory were sown by the first innings batting effort, led admirably by Rahul

story.hline: India stretch lead past 200 in slow-moving session
